pageContext.claim: “Not that it matters but I never fired James Comey because of Russia! The Corrupt Mainstream Media loves to keep pushing that narrative, but they know it is not true!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump himself has said he fired Comey because of the "Russia thing." He made the comment in an interview with Lester Holt of NBC News, shortly after firing Comey. He also told Russian officials in the Oval Office: “I just fired the head of the F.B.I. He was crazy, a real nut job. I faced great pressure because of Russia. That’s taken off.”
